00060 typedef struct{
00061   unsigned short b:5;
00062   unsigned short g:5;
00063   unsigned short r:5;
00064   unsigned short a:1;
00065 
00066   unsigned char R() const {return r << 3;};
00067   unsigned char G() const {return g << 3;};
00068   unsigned char B() const {return b << 3;};
00069 
00070   void setR(unsigned char v) {r = v >> 3;};
00071   void setG(unsigned char v) {g = v >> 3;};
00072   void setB(unsigned char v) {b = v >> 3;};
00073 
00074 
00075 } XV_RGB15;

00267 /*macro used to convert a YUV pixel to RGB format
00268   from Bart Nabbe
00269   note from Donald: this should probably change to a table look-up
00270   method and share with XVDig1394.cc
00271 */
00272 
00273 // old version, conflict with YUVtoRGB
00274 /*
00275 
00276 #define YUV2R(y, u, v) (y + ((v * 1434) / 2048))
00277 #define YUV2G(y, u, v) (y - ((u * 406) / 2048) - ((v * 595) / 2048))
00278 #define YUV2B(y, u, v) (y + ((u * 2078) / 2048))
00279 
00280 #define RGB2Y(r, g, b) ((0.257 * r) + (0.504 * g) + (0.098 * b) + 16)
00281 #define RGB2U(r, g, b) ((0.439 * r) - (0.368 * g) - (0.071 * b) + 128)
00282 #define RGB2V(r, g, b) (-(0.148 * r) - (0.291 * g) + (0.439 * b) + 128)
00283 
00284 */
00285 
00286 /* new version
00287    YUVtoRGB=[ 1 0       1.1402
00288               1 -0.3948 -0.5808
00289               1 2.0326  0 ]
00290 
00291    RGBtoYUV=[ 0.299   0.587     0.114
00292               -0.1471 -0.288804 0.4359
00293               0.6148  -0.5148   -0.1]    
00294 
00295    U and V should be offset by 128
00296 */          
00297                              
00298   
00299 #define YUV2R(y, u, v) (y + (v-128)*9339/8192 )
00300 #define YUV2G(y, u, v) (y - (u-128)*3228/8192 - (v-128)*4760/8192  )
00301 #define YUV2B(y, u, v) (y + (u-128)*16646/8192 ) 
00302 
00303 #define RGB2Y(r, g, b) ( r*2449/8192 + g*4809/8192 + b*934/8192 )
00304 #define RGB2U(r, g, b) ( 128-r*1205/8192 - g*2366/8192 + b*3571/8192 )
00305 #define RGB2V(r, g, b) ( 128+r*5036/8192 - g*4217/8192 - g*819 /8192  )
00306 
00307 
00308 template <class T>
00309 float RGBtoHue(T pixel, int brightPixel = DEFAULT_BRIGHT_PIXEL, int darkPixel = DEFAULT_DARK_PIXEL){
00310   
00311   // normalizing r, g, b
00312   //T max = {255, 255, 255};
00313 
00314   float normalR = (float)pixel.R() / 255;
00315   float normalG = (float)pixel.G() / 255;
00316   float normalB = (float)pixel.B() / 255;
00317 
00318   int whichmax;
00319   float mx, mn;
00320   float hue=0,sat,delta;
00321 
00322   // find the max and min of r, g, and b
00323   if (normalR > normalG) {
00324     whichmax = 1;
00325     mx = normalR;
00326     mn = normalG;
00327   }
00328   else {
00329     whichmax = 2;
00330     mn = normalR;
00331     mx = normalG;
00332   }
00333   
00334   if (normalB < mn) {
00335     mn = normalB;
00336   }
00337   
00338   if (normalB > mx) {
00339     whichmax = 3;
00340     mx = normalB;
00341   }
00342   
00343   delta = (float)(mx - mn);
00344   
00345   // compute saturation
00346   if((mx + mn) > 1.0){
00347     sat = delta / (mx + mn);
00348   }else{
00349     sat = delta / (2 - mx - mn);
00350   }
00351 
00352   short NULL_RETVAL = 0;
00353   if((delta < 1e-9) || (sat < 0.005)) { NULL_RETVAL |= NULL_HUE; }
00354   if((mx * 255) < darkPixel)          { NULL_RETVAL |= NULL_DARK; }
00355   if((mn * 255) > brightPixel)        { NULL_RETVAL |= NULL_BRIGHT; }
00356   if(NULL_RETVAL) return (float)NULL_RETVAL;
00357   
00358   switch (whichmax) {
00359   case 1:
00360     hue = (normalG - normalB) / delta;
00361     break;
00362   case 2:
00363     hue = 2.0 + (normalB - normalR) / delta;
00364     break;
00365   case 3:
00366     hue = 4.0 + (normalR - normalG) / delta;
00367   }
00368 
00369   hue *= 60.0;
00370   if (hue < 0.0)
00371     hue += 360.0;
00372 
00373   return hue;
00374 };
00375 
00376 template <class T>
00377 XV_HSV24 RGBtoHSV(T pixel, int brightPixel = DEFAULT_BRIGHT_PIXEL,
00378             int darkPixel = DEFAULT_DARK_PIXEL){
00379 
00380   // normalizing r, g, b
00381   //T max = {255, 255, 255};
00382 
00383   float normalR = (float)pixel.R() / 255;
00384   float normalG = (float)pixel.G() / 255;
00385   float normalB = (float)pixel.B() / 255;
00386 
00387   int whichmax;
00388   float mx, mn;
00389   float hue=0,sat,val;
00390 
00391   // find the max and min of r, g, and b
00392   if (normalR > normalG) {
00393     whichmax = 1;
00394     mx = normalR;
00395     mn = normalG;
00396   }
00397   else {
00398     whichmax = 2;
00399     mn = normalR;
00400     mx = normalG;
00401   }
00402   
00403   if (normalB < mn) {
00404     mn = normalB;
00405   }
00406   
00407   if (normalB > mx) {
00408     whichmax = 3;
00409     mx = normalB;
00410   }
00411  
00412   val = mx;
00413   float delta = mx - mn;
00414   sat = (mx != 0) ? ((float)delta) / mx : 0.0;
00415   
00416   if((delta < 1e-9) || (sat < 0.005) || (((mx * 255) < darkPixel) || ((mn * 255) > brightPixel)))
00417     {
00418       XV_HSV24 pv; pv.h = (u_char)NULL_HUE; pv.s = 0; pv.v = 0;
00419     }
00420   
00421   switch (whichmax) {
00422   case 1:
00423     hue = (normalG - normalB) / delta;
00424     break;
00425   case 2:
00426     hue = 2.0 + (normalB - normalR) / delta;
00427     break;
00428   case 3:
00429     hue = 4.0 + (normalR - normalG) / delta;
00430   }
00431 
00432   hue *= 60.0;
00433   if (hue < 0.0)
00434     hue += 360.0;
00435 
00436   XV_HSV24 pix; 
00437   pix.h = (u_char)((hue / 0.694) + 0.5); 
00438   pix.s = (u_char)(sat * 255);
00439   pix.v = (u_char)(val * 255);
00440 
00441   return pix;
00442 }; 
00443 
00444 template <class T>
00445 T HSVtoRGB(const XV_HSV24 & pixel){
00446 
00447   if(pixel.s == 0){
00448     T pv; pv.setR(pixel.v); pv.setG(pixel.v); pv.setB(pixel.v);
00449     return pv;
00450   }else{
00451     double h, s, v, f, p, q, t;
00452     int i;
00453     
00454     h = pixel.h * 0.024;
00455     s = pixel.s / 255;
00456     v = pixel.v / 255;
00457     i = (int)floor(h);
00458     f = h - i;
00459     p = v * (1.0 - s);
00460     q = v * (1.0 - (s * f));
00461     t = v * (1.0 - (s * (1.0 - f)));
00462     T rp;
00463     switch(i){
00464     case 0: 
00465       rp.setR(pixel.v); 
00466       rp.setG((u_char)(t * 255)); 
00467       rp.setB((u_char)(p * 255));
00468       break;
00469     case 1: 
00470       rp.setR((u_char)(q * 255)); 
00471       rp.setG(pixel.v); 
00472       rp.setB((u_char)(p * 255));
00473       break;
00474     case 2: 
00475       rp.setR((u_char)(p * 255)); 
00476       rp.setG(pixel.v); 
00477       rp.setB((u_char)(t * 255));
00478       break;
00479     case 3: 
00480       rp.setR((u_char)(p * 255)); 
00481       rp.setG((u_char)(q * 255)); 
00482       rp.setB(pixel.v);
00483       break;
00484     case 4: 
00485       rp.setR((u_char)(t * 255)); 
00486       rp.setG((u_char)(p * 255)); 
00487       rp.setB(pixel.v);
00488       break;
00489     case 5: 
00490       rp.setR(pixel.v); 
00491       rp.setG((u_char)(p * 255)); 
00492       rp.setB((u_char)(q * 255));
00493       break;
00494     };
00495     return rp;
00496   }
00497 };

00637   pout[0].b = (u_char)(YUV2B(pin.y0, pin.u, pin.v)) >> 3;
00638   pout[1].r = (u_char)(YUV2R(pin.y1, pin.u, pin.v)) >> 3;
00639   pout[1].g = (u_char)(YUV2G(pin.y1, pin.u, pin.v)) >> 2;
00640   pout[1].b = (u_char)(YUV2B(pin.y1, pin.u, pin.v)) >> 3;
00641 };

00895 #define HSV_TO_RGB(RGB_TYPE) \
00896 inline void operator <<  (RGB_TYPE & pout, const XV_HSV24 & pin) { \
00897 \
00898   RGB_TYPE tmp = HSVtoRGB<RGB_TYPE>(pin); \
00899   pout << tmp; \
00900 }; 
00901 
00902 HSV_TO_RGB(XV_RGB15);
00903 HSV_TO_RGB(XV_RGB16);
00904 HSV_TO_RGB(XV_RGB24);
00905 HSV_TO_RGB(XV_TRGB24);
00906 HSV_TO_RGB(XV_RGBA32);
00907 HSV_TO_RGB(XV_GLRGBA32);
00908 
00909 #define RGB_TO_YUV16(PIX_TYPE) \
00910 inline void operator <<  (XV_YUV16 & pout, const PIX_TYPE & pin){ \
00911 \
00912   pout.y = (u_char)(RGB2Y(pin.R(), pin.G(), pin.B())); \
00913   pout.u = (u_char)(RGB2U(pin.R(), pin.G(), pin.B())); \
00914   pout.v = (u_char)(RGB2V(pin.R(), pin.G(), pin.B())); \
00915 };
00916  
00917 RGB_TO_YUV16(XV_RGB15);
00918 RGB_TO_YUV16(XV_RGB16);
00919 RGB_TO_YUV16(XV_RGB24);
00920 RGB_TO_YUV16(XV_TRGB24);
00921 RGB_TO_YUV16(XV_RGBA32);
00922 RGB_TO_YUV16(XV_GLRGBA32);
00923 
00924 #define RGB_TO_YUV24(PIX_TYPE) \
00925 inline void operator <<  (XV_YUV24 & pout, const PIX_TYPE & pin){ \
00926 \
00927   pout.y = (u_char)(RGB2Y(pin.R(), pin.G(), pin.B())); \
00928   pout.u = (u_char)(RGB2U(pin.R(), pin.G(), pin.B())); \
00929   pout.v = (u_char)(RGB2V(pin.R(), pin.G(), pin.B())); \
00930 };
00931  
00932 RGB_TO_YUV24(XV_RGB15);
00933 RGB_TO_YUV24(XV_RGB16);
00934 RGB_TO_YUV24(XV_RGB24);
00935 RGB_TO_YUV24(XV_TRGB24);
00936 RGB_TO_YUV24(XV_RGBA32);
00937 RGB_TO_YUV24(XV_GLRGBA32);

00944 inline void operator <<  (XV_YUV24 pout[2], const XV_YUV422 & pin) {
00945   pout[0].y = pin.y0;
00946   pout[0].u = pin.u;
00947   pout[0].v = pin.v;
00948   pout[1].y = pin.y1;
00949   pout[1].u = pin.u;
00950   pout[1].v = pin.v;
00951 };

00954   pout = pin;
00955 };

00957 inline void operator <<  (XV_YUV422 & pout, const XV_YUV24 pin[2]) {
00958   pout.y0 = pin[0].y;
00959   pout.u  = pin[0].u;
00960   pout.y1 = pin[1].y;
00961   pout.v  = pin[1].v;
00962 };

00964 #define RGB_TO_YUV422(RGB_TYPE) \
00965 inline void operator <<  (XV_YUV422 & pout, const RGB_TYPE pin[2]) { \
00966   XV_YUV24 tmp[2]; \
00967   tmp[0] << pin[0]; \
00968   tmp[1] << pin[1]; \
00969   pout << tmp; \
00970 };

01012 #define RGB_TO_SCALAR(RGB_TYPE, SCALAR_TYPE) \
01013 inline void operator << (SCALAR_TYPE & scalar, const RGB_TYPE & rgb) { \
01014   scalar = (SCALAR_TYPE)((rgb.R() + rgb.G() + rgb.B()) / 3); \
01015 };
01016 
01017 #define SCALAR_TO_RGB(SCALAR_TYPE, RGB_TYPE) \
01018 inline void operator << (RGB_TYPE & rgb, const SCALAR_TYPE & scalar) { \
01019   rgb.setR((u_char)scalar); \
01020   rgb.setG((u_char)scalar); \
01021   rgb.setB((u_char)scalar); \
01022 };
01023 
01024 #define _RGB_TO_SCALAR_ALL_SC_(_RGB_TYPE_) \
01025 RGB_TO_SCALAR(_RGB_TYPE_, u_char); \
01026 SCALAR_TO_RGB(u_char, _RGB_TYPE_); \
01027 RGB_TO_SCALAR(_RGB_TYPE_, char); \
01028 SCALAR_TO_RGB(char, _RGB_TYPE_); \
01029 RGB_TO_SCALAR(_RGB_TYPE_, u_short); \
01030 SCALAR_TO_RGB(u_short, _RGB_TYPE_); \
01031 RGB_TO_SCALAR(_RGB_TYPE_, short); \
01032 SCALAR_TO_RGB(short, _RGB_TYPE_); \
01033 RGB_TO_SCALAR(_RGB_TYPE_, u_int); \
01034 SCALAR_TO_RGB(u_int, _RGB_TYPE_); \
01035 RGB_TO_SCALAR(_RGB_TYPE_, int); \
01036 SCALAR_TO_RGB(int, _RGB_TYPE_); \
01037 RGB_TO_SCALAR(_RGB_TYPE_, float); \
01038 SCALAR_TO_RGB(float, _RGB_TYPE_); \
01039 RGB_TO_SCALAR(_RGB_TYPE_, double); \
01040 SCALAR_TO_RGB(double, _RGB_TYPE_);
01041 
01042 _RGB_TO_SCALAR_ALL_SC_(XV_RGB15);
01043 _RGB_TO_SCALAR_ALL_SC_(XV_RGB16);
01044 _RGB_TO_SCALAR_ALL_SC_(XV_RGB24);
01045 _RGB_TO_SCALAR_ALL_SC_(XV_TRGB24);

01049 #define YUV_TO_SCALAR(YUV_TYPE, SCALAR_TYPE) \
01050 inline void operator << (SCALAR_TYPE & scalar, const YUV_TYPE & yuv) { \
01051   scalar = (SCALAR_TYPE)(yuv.y); \
01052 };
01053 
01054 #define SCALAR_TO_YUV(SCALAR_TYPE, YUV_TYPE) \
01055 inline void operator << (YUV_TYPE & yuv, const SCALAR_TYPE & scalar) { \
01056   yuv.setY((u_char)scalar); yuv.setU(0); yuv.setV(0); \
01057 };

01084 #define SCALAR_TO_HSV(SCALAR_TYPE, HSV_TYPE) \
01085 inline void operator << (HSV_TYPE & hsv, const SCALAR_TYPE & scalar) { \
01086   hsv.v = (u_char)scalar; hsv.h = 0; hsv.s = 0; \
01087 };
01088

01109 #define YUV422_TO_SCALAR(SCALAR) \
01110 inline void operator << (SCALAR sc[2], const XV_YUV422 & yuv) { \
01111   sc[0] = yuv.y0; sc[1] = yuv.y1; \
01112 };
01113 
01114 #define SCALAR_TO_YUV422(SCALAR) \
01115 inline void operator << (XV_YUV422 & yuv, const SCALAR sc[2]) { \
01116   yuv.y0 = (u_char)sc[0]; yuv.y1 = (u_char)sc[1]; yuv.u = 0; yuv.v = 0; \
01117 };

01158 #define PRINT_RGB_PIXEL(PIX) \
01159 inline ostream &operator << (ostream & output, const PIX & RGB) { \
01160   output.width(3); \
01161   output<<'['; \
01162   output.width(3); \
01163   output<<static_cast<int>(RGB.r)<<','; \
01164   output.width(3); \
01165   output<<static_cast<int>(RGB.g)<<','; \
01166   output.width(3); \
01167   output<<static_cast<int>(RGB.b)<<']'; \
01168   return output; \
01169 };
01170 
01171 PRINT_RGB_PIXEL(XV_RGB15);
01172 PRINT_RGB_PIXEL(XV_RGB16);
01173 PRINT_RGB_PIXEL(XV_RGB24);
01174 PRINT_RGB_PIXEL(XV_TRGB24);
01175 PRINT_RGB_PIXEL(XV_RGBA32);

01177 #define RGB_DOT_PROD(PIX) \
01178 inline int dot(const PIX & p1, const PIX & p2){ \
01179   return (p1.r * p2.r + p1.g * p2.g + p1.b * p2.b); \
01180 };
01181 
01182 RGB_DOT_PROD(XV_RGB15);
01183 RGB_DOT_PROD(XV_RGB16);
01184 RGB_DOT_PROD(XV_RGB24);
01185 RGB_DOT_PROD(XV_TRGB24);
01186 RGB_DOT_PROD(XV_RGBA32);
01187 RGB_DOT_PROD(XV_GLRGBA32);
01188 
01189 #define RGB_CROSS_PROD(PIX) \
01190 inline PIX cross(const PIX & p1, const PIX & p2){ \
01191   PIX prod = {(p1.g * p2.b - p1.b * p2.g), \
01192          (p1.r * p2.b - p1.b * p2.r),  \
01193          (p1.r * p2.g - p1.g * p2.r)}; \
01194   return prod; \
01195 };
01196 
01197 RGB_CROSS_PROD(XV_RGB15);
01198 RGB_CROSS_PROD(XV_RGB16);
01199 RGB_CROSS_PROD(XV_RGB24);
01200 RGB_CROSS_PROD(XV_TRGB24);
01201 RGB_CROSS_PROD(XV_RGBA32);
01202 RGB_CROSS_PROD(XV_GLRGBA32);
01203 
01204 #define RGB_LENGTH(PIX) \
01205 inline double length(const PIX & p){ \
01206   return sqrt((double)sqr(p.r) + sqr(p.g) + sqr(p.b)); \
01207 }; 
01208 
01209 RGB_LENGTH(XV_RGB15);
01210 RGB_LENGTH(XV_RGB16);
01211 RGB_LENGTH(XV_RGB24);
01212 RGB_LENGTH(XV_TRGB24);
01213 RGB_LENGTH(XV_RGBA32);
01214 RGB_LENGTH(XV_GLRGBA32);

01216 #define MAKE_RGB_PIXEL_OP(OP, PIX) \
01217 inline PIX operator OP (const PIX & p1, const PIX & p2){ \
01218   PIX result; \
01219   result.r = p1.r OP p2.r; result.g = p1.g OP p2.g; result.b = p1.b OP p2.b; \
01220   return result; \
01221 }; 
01222 
01223 #define MAKE_RGB_PIXEL_MODIFY_OP(OP, PIX) \
01224 inline PIX operator OP (PIX & p1, const PIX & p2){ \
01225   p1.r OP p2.r;  p1.g OP p2.g; p1.b OP p2.b; \
01226   return p1; \
01227 }; 
01228 
01229 #define MAKE_RGB_PIXEL_CONST_SCALAR_OP(OP, PIX) \
01230 inline PIX operator OP (const PIX & p1, int val) { \
01231   PIX result;  result.r = p1.r OP val;  result.g = p1.g OP val; result.b = p1.b OP val; \
01232  return result; \
01233 };
01234 
01235 #define MAKE_RGB_PIXEL_SCALAR_OP(OP, PIX) \
01236 inline PIX & operator OP (PIX & p1, int val){ \
01237   p1.r OP val;  p1.g OP val;  p1.b OP val; \
01238   return p1; \
01239 };
